title: Futura, but not quite
content:
I'm wondering if anyone can help me out with this. :) I am trying to write an identity manual for a client (this one's for the logo construction section) and the contact person from the design agency that designed the logo said they lost the original file in their archives. I tried Futura. Close, but for some reason it still wouldn't fit.

Help! (and thanks :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_4847.jpg)
author: Claudine

comments.content:
Which Futura did you try?  
Futuras differ from foundry to foundry.  
I think Linotype or URW Futura (Bold) match pretty well.
